results.title: Live Love Laugh-Original Hand Painted Sign on Distressed Wood with White & Blue Chalk Paint-A Reminder to Live with Love and Humor!
results.description:
LIVE LOVE LAUGH!!!!

What better sign to have in your house as a reminder of how to live life? Martha took a wood scrap, distressed it and added the chalk paint and lettering. The white is vibrant, and the rich blue lettering is a soft papyrus font. This is a unique and original, one-of-a-kind sign. 

Hang it over a doorway, mantle, fireplace, kitchen cabinet or porch. It has 2 drill holes in the back for easy and secure hanging.   It also makes a great housewarming gift.

It measures 26" long by 3 1/2" high. A perfect fit!

results.title: Live Laugh Love Butterfly - Quality Vinyl Wall Decal/Sticker
results.description:
The vinyl has no background edge or extra white vinyl. 

One of our most popular decals.

Grafix Wall Art is a small business operating in East Auckland.
We provide high quality New Zealand made decals, murals and canvas Art that look better and last longer than other cheaper imported alternatives. 

We make all of our products to order, they're all handmade or printed here in our studio in Auckland, New Zealand.

We specialise in only using materials that you will be able to apply with ease and without specialist help to install. Made from vinyl especially made for walls, and interior windows and mirrors. Instructions are supplied with every product delivered. Clean removal is a breeze.
Head to youtube to see how easy it is to put up your own decal.

For more products head to www.wallart.co.nz for more info.
Please get in contact with us if you have ANY questions!

WE HAPPILY SHIP OVERSEAS!

results.title: Live well. Laugh often. Love much. - Saying/Quote Wall Decal
results.description:
Vinyl Wall Saying:

Love well. 
Laugh often. 
Love much.


{ An Original Text Design by Vinyl Craze. Do not copy or replicate. }


OPTION: Size selection determines option.
SIZE: Various sizes to choose from (may vary +/- 1/2" of length noted).
    **Option A  - 27" and larger decals will ship in two (or more) decals
    **Option B will ship in two decals
    **Option C will ship in three decals
COLOR: Your choice from any color on the Vinyl Craze Color Chart.


When ordering, choose the OPTION/SIZE and MAIN COLOR from the drop down choices.
In the NOTES section at checkout, please include the OPTION (if required).


When selecting a size, please consider the size incorporates the characteristics of the text (loops), blank space between lines (see pictures), and author/speaker name (unless the listing specifically indicates the name is not included in the size). Please contact me before purchasing if you are looking for a specific font size.

Decals under 12" and over 22" will ship as two (or more) decals with placement markers.


Decals are made fresh to order, in the USA in our Vinyl Craze studio.
If you need a particular size or color not listed here, I welcome you to contact me with your request.
 

All wall vinyl colors have a matte (flat) finish for a natural hand-painted appearance. Decals are removable, but not reusable, and are ideal and safe for interior decor. Our designs are precision-cut from top-grade colored vinyl, not ink printed on white or clear stickers. Vinyl decals can be applied to most smooth and lightly textured surfaces such as walls, glass, mirrors, tile, ceramic, smooth plastic, metal, and non-porous wood. 


Included with purchase: 
• professional quality vinyl wall decal
• easy-to-follow instructions
• sample test decal
• card application tool.

results.title: Folded book art Live Laugh Love Book Folds Book sculpture 3 book set Personalized Gift Wedding gift Book folding Mantel Decor Book page art
results.description:
This is a 3 book fold set. Live Laugh Love. Perfect gift for a friend or treat yourself! You can display these book folds on a fireplace mantel, table, accent a bookshelf or they can even be a centerpiece for your table. It will surely grab everybody's attention!

As a bonus to you, I will include a book cover and ribbon. 

Book cover colors: red, green, orange, pink, black, navy, royal blue
Ribbon colors: red, green, blue, yellow, pink, lavender, purple, black, white, silver, gold, hot pink, light blue, 
Christmas, Wedding and Happy Birthday ribbons

Message me the colors you would like.

I love turning recycled books into something new an unique that will be treasured forever. Each book is made carefully by folding individual pages of a book to form a word, image, number. Anything is possible!

I can work with you on a custom order to create books you will treasure forever. Please message me and we can talk about it.

Perfect for any occasion! Birthdays, Holidays, Weddings, Baby Showers etc. 

Because every book is completely handmade from recycled books, they may vary slightly from piece to piece.

Book Fold Art will be created, packed and shipped within 2 weeks of payment via USPS. 

Thank you for taking the time to look at my work.

results.title: Faith Hope Love Arrow Quote Vector Digital Design Download - Ready to use Digital File, Vinyl Design Saying, Printable Quotes, Vector Arrow
results.description:
Faith Hope Love Arrow Quote Vector Digital Design Download - Ready to use Digital File, Vinyl Design Saying, Printable Quotes, home wall art

**THIS ITEM IS A DIGITAL DOWNLOAD**

-----------------------------------------------------------------
DIGITAL DOWNLOAD PRODUCT INFORMATION
-----------------------------------------------------------------

DESIGN: 

FILE FORMATS:  .PNG   -&-   .AI   -&-   .JPG   -&-   .DXF 

STYLE: Vinyl Ready, Welded

COPYRIGHT: Personal

Vinyl Ready! Original design, professionally created vector art.
Clean lines with minimal anchor points for fast cutting and smooth edges even at extremely large sizes for signs & wall decals.
Beautiful addition to your design collection to offer your customers.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
LOOKING FOR A PRODUCT INSTEAD OF DIGITAL DOWNLOAD?
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Let us help you turn this item into a vinyl decal or home decor item by visiting our physical item shop here:
www.LEVinyl.etsy.com

Also excellent for any of your special projects such as laser cutting, embroidery, applique, screen printing, engraving, etching, digital graphic design projects, even print on demand like CafePress & Zazzle too.


-----------------------------------------------------------------
COPYRIGHT LICENSE / USER AGREEMENT
-----------------------------------------------------------------

COMMERCIAL - TANGIBLE 500
- Use for physical, tangible items only. 
- You may incorporate my designs into your own designs.
- Do not post for sale on Cafepress, Zazzle, Spoonflower, or other On-Demand Printing websites.
- Do not share, give away, post online as a download, include in any digital set, or distribute in any other digital or electronic form. 
- Do not claim this art, design, or photo (as is) as your own creation.

-----------------------------------------------------------------
GLOSSARY OF TERMS
-----------------------------------------------------------------
* .eps FILE: Encapsulated PostScript file format
* .ai FILE: Adobe Illustrator (CS4) file format - CAN BE OPENED WITH ANYTHING NEWER
* .png: "Transparent" background - perfect for creating printed items

* VECTOR: Graphics created using paths and strokes with anchor points allowing you to use the design at any size. Tiny to huge.
* VINYL READY: All elements are welded for smooth cutting.
* WELDED: All elements are joined and negative spaces are transparent
* NOT WELDED: Overlapping elements are independent and can be rearranged or manipulated for new designs.

If you have any questions, please ask before you purchase since due to the nature of instant digital downloads, we are unable to give refunds. 


-----------------------------------------------------------------
FAQ
-----------------------------------------------------------------

-Are other file formats available? 
Yes, if you are looking for a specific file format just email us and let us know!


-Can I turn around and sell this in my store?
No, this is for personal use only. Meaning, you can create your own items but can't sell those items with our designs on them.

-Do you make custom items?
We sure do! We offer a custom listing for DOWN PAYMENT on a project here:

________
Once the custom order has been purchased we will begin working on the custom order and send over a price quote. Like any product that takes time before even starting, we must ask for a down payment before starting. *We may refund the down payment at our discretion.*

Installation:
You will be provided with an instruction sheet with your order. Whether this is your very first time using a vinyl decal or you are a seasoned pro, please don't hesitate to contact me if you have any installation questions.



Made To Order:
Every decal is made to order once purchased. This means that we will cut your design in the color you have chosen only after your order has been placed.
It can take anywhere from 1 to 3 business days for your order to be cut and shipped out, but most orders are shipped the same or next day.
